## Player.requestAgentInfo() method

Get agent infos, optionally of a particular cell.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
requestAgentInfo(cellId?: CellId): Promise<any[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cellId | CellId | The cell id to get agent infos of. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;any\[\]&gt;

The agent infos.
